Switch on a light by using `switchLightOn()` and [passing](glossary://pass) in `.red`, `.green`, or `.blue`. - callout(Example): `switchLightOn(.blue)`
**Pro tip**: Switching on a light switches off all other lights.

[Pass](glossary://pass) in a crystal to `setItemA()` and combine it with another item to make something useful. - callout(Example): ``` setItemA(.crystal) setItemB(.cloth) switchLightOn(.green) forgeItems() ```
Combine crystal with another item, but try changing the light to blue before you forge.
